imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

tag.description: Alertmanager image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Alertmanager image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

configuration.description: Alertmanager configuration. This content will be stored in the the alertmanager.yaml file and the content can be a template.
configuration.default:
receivers:
  - name: default-receiver
route:
  group_wait: 10s
  group_interval: 5m
  receiver: default-receiver
  repeat_interval: 3h

replicaCount.description: Number of Alertmanager replicas to deploy

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

limits.description: The resources limits for the Alertmanager containers

requests.description: The requested resources for the Alertmanager containers

fsGroup.description: Set Alertmanager pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set Alertmanager containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set Alertmanager containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set Alertmanager containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

existingConfigmap.description: The name of an existing ConfigMap with your custom configuration for Alertmanager

existingConfigmapKey.description: The name of the key with the Alertmanager config file

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

extraArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the Prometheus server container

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of pods that may be made unavailable

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for Alertmanager pods assignment

podManagementPolicy.description: Statefulset Pod management policy, it needs to be Parallel to be able to complete the cluster join

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for Alertmanager pods

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds Redmine pod needs to terminate gracefully

lifecycleHooks.description: for the Alertmanager container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to Alertmanager nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for Alertmanager nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for Alertmanager nodes

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the Alertmanager pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the Alertmanager container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the Alertmanager pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the Alertmanager pod(s)

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Alertmanager

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

annotations.description: Additional Service Account annotations (evaluated as a template)

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for Alertmanager service

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in Alertmanager service (normally used with the `sidecars` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

enabled.description: Enable Alertmanager data persistence using VolumeClaimTemplates

mountPath.description: Path to mount the volume at.

subPath.description: The subdirectory of the volume to mount to, useful in dev environments and one PV for multiple services

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for Concourse worker data volume

accessModes.description: PVC Access Mode for Concourse worker volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for Concourse worker volume

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume (this value is evaluated as a template)

tag.description: Prometheus image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Prometheus image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

configuration.description: Promethus configuration. This content will be stored in the the prometheus.yaml file and the content can be a template.

alertingRules.description: Prometheus alerting rules. This content will be stored in the the rules.yaml file and the content can be a template.

extraScrapeConfigs.description: Promethus configuration, useful to declare new scrape_configs. This content will be merged with the 'server.configuration' value and stored in the the prometheus.yaml file.

replicaCount.description: Number of Prometheus replicas to deploy

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

limits.description: The resources limits for the Prometheus containers

requests.description: The requested resources for the Prometheus containers

fsGroup.description: Set Prometheus pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set Prometheus containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set Prometheus containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set Prometheus containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

existingConfigmap.description: The name of an existing ConfigMap with your custom configuration for Prometheus

existingConfigmapKey.description: The name of the key with the Prometheus config file

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

extraArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the Prometheus server container

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of pods that may be made unavailable

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for Prometheus pods assignment

type.description: Prometheus deployment strategy type. If persistence is enabled, strategy type should be set to Recreate to avoid dead locks.

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for Prometheus pods

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds Redmine pod needs to terminate gracefully

lifecycleHooks.description: for the Prometheus container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to Prometheus nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for Prometheus nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for Prometheus nodes

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the Prometheus pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the Prometheus container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the Prometheus pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the Prometheus pod(s)

routePrefix.description: Prefix for the internal routes of web endpoints

remoteWrite.description: The remote_write spec configuration for Prometheus

enableRemoteWriteReceiver.description: Enable Prometheus to be used as a receiver for the Prometheus remote write protocol.

enableFeatures.description: Enable access to Prometheus disabled features.

alertingEndpoints.description: Alertmanagers to which alerts will be sent

externalLabels.description: External labels to add to any time series or alerts when communicating with external systems

digest.description: Thanos image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Switch privilegeEscalation possibility on or off

runAsNonRoot.description: Force the container to run as a non root user

drop.description: Linux Kernel capabilities which should be dropped

extraArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the thanos sidecar container

secretName.description: Support mounting a Secret for the objectStorageConfig of the sideCar container.

secretKey.description: Secret key with the configuration file.

extraVolumeMounts.description: Additional volumeMounts from `server.volumes` for thanos sidecar container

limits.description: The resources limits for the Thanos sidecar container

requests.description: The resources requests for the Thanos sidecar container

enabled.description: Turn on and off liveness probe

initialDelaySeconds.description: Delay before liveness probe is initiated

periodSeconds.description: How often to perform the probe

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe

enabled.description: Turn on and off readiness probe

initialDelaySeconds.description: Delay before readiness probe is initiated

periodSeconds.description: How often to perform the probe

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

clusterIP.description: Specific cluster IP when service type is cluster IP. Use `None` to create headless service by default.

grpc.description: Specify the nodePort value for the LoadBalancer and NodePort service types.

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Address that are allowed when svc is `LoadBalancer`

extraPorts.description: Additional ports to expose from the Thanos sidecar container

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraRules.description: The list of additional rules to be added to this ingress record. Evaluated as a template

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

annotations.description: Additional Service Account annotations (evaluated as a template)

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for Prometheus service

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in Prometheus service (normally used with the `sidecars` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin. ClientIP by default.

enabled.description: Enable persistence using Persistent Volume Claims. If you have multiple instances (server.repicacount > 1), please considere using an external storage service like Thanos or Grafana Mimir

mountPath.description: Path to mount the volume at.

subPath.description: The subdirectory of the volume to mount to, useful in dev environments and one PV for multiple services

existingClaim.description: The name of an existing PVC to use for persistence

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume for WordPress data PVC

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes the owner/group of the PV mount point to `runAsUser:fsGroup`

tag.description: Bitnami Shell image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

limits.description: The resources limits for the init container

requests.description: The requested resources for the init container

runAsUser.description: Set init container's Security Context runAsUser
